issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
command line in window:

{code}
node C:\Users\rober_000\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\titanium\bin\titanium build -p windows -G 00000000-0000-1000-8000-000000000000 -C 8-1-1
project classic = sucess > http://postimg.org/image/6hf0yuq9j/
project alloy = error > http://postimg.org/image/sj5edufzr/
{code}

help pls for compile alloy ? and titanium studio not detect windows phone sdk's error > [windows sdk home]
fields.summary: Unable to compile Alloy project for windows phone
fields.environment:
Windows 8.1 64bits 
Titanium sdk 3.5.1 (for windows phone) GA or 4.1.0.v20150415182833

comments.body: If you try the command in the screenshot "alloy.cmd compile c:\ ..." in a terminal prompt, what happens?
Hello [~robertorp], Are you still facing the issue in Appcelerator studio? Upgrade your studio, CLI, SDK and try. Thanks.
